pathParameters.name: subscriptionId
pathParameters.description: Gets subscription ID which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

pathParameters.name: resourceGroupName
pathParameters.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.

pathParameters.name: serviceName
pathParameters.description: The name of the Service resource.

pathParameters.name: appName
pathParameters.description: The name of the App resource.

pathParameters.description: The name of the Deployment resource.
